page.title: 09Life Styles
page.content: I like New Addington because I have been brought up here.I moved into New Addington when I was six months old.When I was only three years old people offered to take me for a walk and I got to know everyone and when I was three and a half years old I went to playschool in St.Edwards church.I got a bit tired of it when I was four years old and a half,I did not want to go anymore and I started to cry and went home.When I was four and three quarters the council sent some leaflets through that asked me what school I wished to go to.There was a big selection I went to Fairchildes Infants,and then Fairchildes Junior School,my next school will be Addington High.Everything I could possibly want is in Addington,swing parks, swimming pools,fairs twice a year.If I had a choice I wouldn't move.
